import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from "axios"; export default class Programs extends Component { state= { programs:[], masters:[], doctorals:[] } componentWillMount() { this.jwtHandler(); this.seperate(); } jwtHandler = async () => { await axios({ url: "http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/programs", method: "GET", }) .then((response) => this.setState({ programs: response.data.payload.programs }), ) .catch(() => console.log("Programlar gÃ¶sterilemedi")); }; seperate=()=>{ {this.state.programs.map((aProgram) => { aProgram.degree === "Master" ? this.masters.push(aProgram) : this.doctorals.push(aProgram) } ) }} render() { return (

Here is a subtitle for this table

The masterâs degree generally requires a minimum of one academic year of study, while the engineerâs degree requires two years. Admission to MIT for the masterâs degree does not necessarily imply an automatic commitment by MIT beyond that level of study.

Doctoral Degrees

Here is a subtitle for this table

A doctoral degree requires the satisfactory completion of an approved program of advanced study and original research of high quality. The PhD and ScD degrees are awarded interchangeably by all departments in the School of Engineering and the School of Science except in the fields of biology, cognitive science, neuroscience, medical engineering, and medical physics.
